General.Name: Wafangdian Bearing Co Ltd
General.Description: Wafangdian Bearing Company Limited manufactures and sells bearing, mechanical equipment, auto parts, and related products in China and internationally. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Wafangdian, China. Wafangdian Bearing Company Limited is a subsidiary of Wafangdian Bearing Group Corporation.

1.Name: Ms. Nanjuan  Sun
1.Title: Gen. Accountant, Sec. of Board & Non-Independent Director

2.Name: Mr. Fuxiang  Zhang
2.Title: Head of Quality Assurance Department & Supervisor
